title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - October 12, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - October 12, 2021
description:
Mark and Gary link up while Adam is traveling and discuss the NFL turmoil surrounding yet another embroiled head coach as well as the latest in the Gabby Petito case and breaking news out a New York corrections institution and more.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
